S01E01 The Boy in the Iceberg: Katara: Why is it that every time you play with magic water, I get soaked?
S01E02 The Avatar Returns: Zuko: The Avatar is the only one who can stop the Fire Nation.
S01E03 The Southern Air Temple: Aang: They're gone, aren't they? My whole family... gone.
S01E04 The Warriors of Kyoshi: Sokka: I am a warrior... but I'm not wearing a dress!
S01E05 The King of Omashu: King Bumi: Let us leave... the chamber of secrets!
S01E06 Imprisoned: Katara: Earthbending is a gift. It's your birthright!
S01E07 Winter Solstice Part 1 The Spirit: Iroh: Even in the material world, you will find that the energy is still connected.
S01E08 Winter Solstice Part 2 Avatar Rok: Roku: The Fire Nation must be stopped. That is my mission, and my burden.
S01E10 Jet: Jet: Freedom fighters fight for freedom. We're not terrorists.
S01E11 The Great Divide: Sokka: This is why I don't like group projects.
S01E12 The Storm: Iroh: Prince Zuko was lucky to be born.
S01E13 The Blue Spirit: Zhao: He had help... from the Blue Spirit.
S01E14 The Fortuneteller: Aunt Wu: Your future is full of struggle and anguish—most of it self-inflicted.
S01E15 Bato of the Water Tribe: Hakoda: I am proud of you, son.
S01E16 The Deserter: Jeong Jeong: You are not ready! You are too weak!
S01E17 The Northern Air Temple: Teo: I think your great-grandfather would have really liked these new gliders.
S01E18 The Waterbending Master: Master Pakku: No woman has ever trained here before.
S01E19 The Siege of the North Part 1: Zhao: I will capture the Moon Spirit!
S01E20 The Siege of the North Part 2: Aang: I am the bridge between the material world and the spirit world.
S02E01 The Avatar State: Earth King: You have been in the Avatar State. It's dangerous.
S02E02 The Cave of Two Lovers: Iroh: Follow your passion and life will reward you.
S02E03 Return to Omashu: Mai: Just take the city already.
S02E04 The Swamp: Huu: Time is an illusion. So is death.
S02E05 Avatar Day: Sokka: I'm going to become... a detective!
S02E06 The Blind Bandit: Toph: I'm the greatest earthbender in the world!
S02E07 Zuko Alone: Zuko: My name is Lee now.
S02E08 The Chase: Azula: You seem a little... sleep deprived.
S02E09 Bitter Work: Iroh: Lightning is a pure expression of firebending.
S02E10 The Library: Wan Shi Tong: I am the spirit of knowledge.
S02E11 The Desert: Sokka: I'm starting to see things, Appa!
S02E12 The Serpents Pass: Aang: Life is like a river; it goes where it must.
S02E13 The Drill: Sokka: This is bad... really bad!
S02E14 City of Walls and Secrets: Long Feng: The Earth King has no idea this war is even happening.
S02E15 Tales of Ba Sing Se: Iroh: Leaves from the vine, falling so slow...
S02E16 Appas Lost Days: Guru Pathik: Your emotions have clouded your mind.
S02E17 Lake Laogai: Jet: There is no war in Ba Sing Se...
S02E18 The Earth King: Aang: We're going to tell the Earth King the truth.
S02E19 The Guru: Guru Pathik: Let go your earthly tether.
S02E20 The Crossroads of Destiny: Azula: I am a people person.
S03E02 The Headband: Aang: School is kind of fun!
S03E03 The Painted Lady: Katara: The Painted Lady won't let your village suffer.
S03E04 Sokkas Master: Sokka: I want to learn swordsmanship.
S03E05 The Beach: Zuko: I don't know who I am anymore.
S03E06 The Avatar and the Firelord: Avatar Roku: Learn from my failures.
S03E08 The Puppetmaster: Hama: I control the water in your blood.
S03E09 Nightmares and Daydreams: Aang: What if I forget the dance?
S03E10 The Day of Black Sun Part 1: Sokka: Today is the day we invade the Fire Nation!
S03E11 The Day of Black Sun Part 2: Azula: You didn’t think it would be that easy, did you?
S03E12 The Western Air Temple: Zuko: I'm ready to teach you firebending.
S03E13 The Firebending Masters: Aang: The dragons are still alive!
S03E14 The Boiling Rock Part 1: Sokka: I have to rescue my dad.
S03E15 The Boiling Rock Part 2: Mai: I love Zuko more than I fear you.
S03E17 The Ember Island Players: Toph: At least it was funny.
S03E18 Sozins Comet Part 1 The Phoenix K: Ozai: I am the Phoenix King!
S03E19 Sozins Comet Part 2 The Old Maste: Iroh: It is time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions.
S03E21 Sozins Comet Part 4 Avatar Aang: Aang: I’m not going to end it like this. I’m going to find another way.
